results.overview: Three strangers share an obsession with true crime and suddenly find themselves wrapped up in one.
results.name: Only Murders in the Building

results.overview: The Only Murders in the Building aftershow that isn't afraid to tackle the hard question. One question. That's it. Featuring host Ali Stroker, the show's actors, a slew of celebrity superfans and one big murder to solve it just might be the only Only Murders In the Building aftershow you need to watch.
results.name: One Killer Question
